archimate:BusinessObject.name: CompAtomicConfigSpecRel
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: A type of ConfgSpecRelationship that represents a group of ConfigurationSpecifications that are used to configure an ConfigurationSpecification that is made up of other ConfigurationSpecfications. For example, the ConfigurationSpecification for a connection may be composed of the specification for the connection as well as the specification for connection termination points that are assigned to the connection.
